message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you, considering its potential worth.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
